description: General information about the metadata record.

___alternateMetadataReference.description: Reference to alternative metadata for the resource.

_88series.description: Information about the series, or aggregate resource, to which a resource belongs.
_88series.title: series

___responsibleParty.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organization(s) associated with the cited resource.

___alternateTitle.description: Alias by which the cited resource is known.

___otherCitationDetails.description: Other information required to complete the citation that is not recorded elsewhere.

ISO 19115-2: CI_Citation > citedResponsibleParty > CI_ResponsibleParty > contact > CI_Contact > onlineResource > CI_OnlineResource

___onlineResource.description: On-line information related to the citation.

___graphic.description: Online graphic associated with the citation

___presentationForm.description: The form that the resource is presented, such as: digital map, digital document, etc.

___title.description: Name by which the cited resource is known.

___identifier.description: Identifier for the resource in the context of the citation.

___date.description: Date referenced to the cited resource.

___metadataOnlineResource.description: Online location where the metadata is available.

$eref.description: Information about accessing online resources and services.

___description.description: Detailed text description of what the online resource is/does.

___function.description: Function performed by the online resource.

___applicationProfile.description: Name of an application profile that can be used with the online resource.

___protocol.description: The connection protocol to be used such as: ftp, http, etc.

___protocolRequest.description: Request used to access the resource depending on the protocol, e.g. body of POST(http)_ request.

___metadataContact.description: Person or organization responsible for metadata information (metadata custodian).

___contactId.description: Identifier matching a contactId in the main contact array.

___organizationMembers.description: Identifies individuals that have an association with an organization contact.

___roleExtent.description: The area or period of time for which the role is valid.

___party.description: Identifies all the contacts associated with the role.

___role.description: Function performed by the contact in the current context.

___description.description: A natural language description of the meaning of the identifier value.

___namespace.description: A string which unambiguously defines the namespace for the identifier.

___identifier.description: A name that is used to identify the resource.

___authority.description: Citation for the authority issuing the identifier.

___metadataDate.description: Date that the metadata was updated.

___description.description: Supplemental information describing the date context.

___otherMetadataLocale.description: Additional localised language(s) and characterset(s) used within the metadata record.

$eref.description: Localised language(s) and characterset(s) used within the resource being described.

___language.description: Language(s) used within the resource. Should be a valid ISO 639-3 code.

___country.description: Designation of the specific country of the locale language(ISO 3166-1).

___characterSet.description: Full name of the character encoding standard used by the resource(see http://www.iana.org/assignments/character-sets/character-sets.xhtml).

$eref.description: Localised language(s) and characterset(s) used within the resource being described.

___language.description: Language(s) used within the resource. Should be a valid ISO 639-3 code.

___country.description: Designation of the specific country of the locale language(ISO 3166-1).

___characterSet.description: Full name of the character encoding standard used by the resource(see http://www.iana.org/assignments/character-sets/character-sets.xhtml).

___defaultMetadataLocale.description: Main localised language and characterset used within the metadata record.

$eref.description: Information about the maintenance of a resource.

___frequency.description: Describes the frequency of additions and updates made to a resource.

___scope.description: Type of resource to which the maintenance information applies.

___note.description: Notes regarding the maintenance of the resource.

___contact.description: Contact information for the maintainer of the resource.

___metadataMaintenance.description: Provides information about the frequency of metadata updates, and the scope of those updates.

___metadataConstraint.description: Provides information about restrictions on the access and use of metadata.

anyOf.title: security required if type is security
legal required if type is legal

_88securityConstraint.description: Handling restrictions imposed on the resource or metadata for national security or similar security concerns.

___userNote.description: Explanation of the application of the legal constraints or other restrictions and legal prerequisites for obtaining and using the resource or metadata.

___classification.description: Name of the handling restrictions on the resource or metadata.

___classificationSystem.description: Name of the classification system associated with a security constraint.

___handlingDescription.description: Additional description regarding the security handling of the resource or metadata.

_88legalConstraint.description: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource or metadata.

___useConstraint.description: Constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations or warnings on using the resource or metadata.

___accessConstraint.description: Access constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations on obtaining the resource or metadata.

___otherConstraint.description: Other restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource or metadata.

___useLimitation.description: Limitation affecting the fitness for use of the resource or metadata. For example, "not to be used for navigation".

___responsibleParty.description: Entity responsible for the resource constraint

___graphic.description: Graphic or symbol indicating the constraint

___reference.description: Citation for the limitation or constraint

___scope.description: temporal extent and or level of the application of the constraint restrictions.

___releasability.description: Information concerning the parties to who the resource can or cannot be released.

_88series.description: Information about the series, or aggregate resource, to which a resource belongs.
_88series.title: series

___responsibleParty.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organization(s) associated with the cited resource.

___alternateTitle.description: Alias by which the cited resource is known.

___otherCitationDetails.description: Other information required to complete the citation that is not recorded elsewhere.

___onlineResource.description: On-line information related to the citation.

___graphic.description: Online graphic associated with the citation

___presentationForm.description: The form that the resource is presented, such as: digital map, digital document, etc.

___title.description: Name by which the cited resource is known.

___identifier.description: Identifier for the resource in the context of the citation.

___date.description: Date referenced to the cited resource.

___parentMetadata.description: Identifier of the metadata to which this metadata is a subset (child).
